Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2879 affecting package ig for versions less than 0.29.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-2879 affecting package ig for versions less than 0.29.0-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package ig is earlier than 0.29.0-1, affected by CVE-2022-2879
